Class DisplayBar

java.lang.Object
  com.golden.gamedev.object.Sprite
      vooga.stats.Display

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DisplayBar
extends Display

The StatsLayerBar class displays a bar that grows or shrinks with Stat class

Author:
Chao Chen
